hanzi-su-wiki:
償

Значения

Возмещать, окупаться, искупать

Мнемоника

Хвалить 賞 и награждать рабами 亻. Награда, вознаграждение.

Варианты

偿
purpleculture_pinyin:
cháng
to repay; to compensate for; to recompense; to fulfill (hopes etc)
погасить; компенсировать; возместить; исполнить (надежды и т. д.)

偿偿		repay, recompense, restitution
  • person 亻 rewarding 賞 someone he loaned from
  • ⓢ person 亻 of a good restaurant 尝 being repaid after a meal

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T says, "This ain't no prize, foo! This is repayrations for slavery!".
heisig_constituent: reparation, person, prize, outhouse, small, little, crown, mouth, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
Keyword_KANJIDIC: reparation, make up for, recompense, redeem
koohiiStory1: Mr. T says, "This ain´t no prize, foo! This is reparations for slavery!".
koohiiStory2: NOTE: do not confuse with compensation (#476)賠. However, 賠 is always used in conjunction 賠償... But 償 is used in various other compounds. Mr. T sold all his jewelry to give as reparations to slave families. The governent tried to honor his charity by giving him a prize, but it was a shitty outhouse filled with clams.
jp_example_words:
賠償(ばいしょう): reparations, indemnity, compensation
弁償(べんしょう): next word, compensation, reparation, indemnity, reimbursement
補償(ほしょう): compensation, reparation
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader presents you with a prize as reparation for his past deeds. This leader wronged you in the past and wishes to make amends. Therefore the leader presents you with a reparation in the form of a glittering prize.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine receiving your reparation prize. Feel the prize in your hand. It’s all wrapped up but it’s heavy and feels expensive. What could it be?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The leader who presented you with this reparation is the Shougun (しょう) of Japan. He's trying to make up for all the threats he made to you and some of the things you saw (which he's now trying to cover up for).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine receiving your reparations from the Shougun himself. You're angry at him for threatening you, wounding people, and cutting off the heads of people who go against him, but you take it anyway.
Ru_Meaning: reparation, make up for, recompense, redeem
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), ハ, 冖 (ва), 口 (рот), 尚 (ещё), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:
cháng: (графема) компенсировать, возвращать (долг)
cháng: (графема) (о желании) сбываться, исполняться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the prize (賞) the man (亻) gives is reparations
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When Mr. T annoys someone by mistake he like to repay them by using his great taste in restaurants to treat them to dinner.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " people " to " appreciation " sound. The original meaning is to return and repay. "Said Wen": "Pay, pay back. From the people, appreciate the sound." "Guang Ya. Interpretation: "Compensation, recovery." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Three Years of Ding Gong: "For the reason that the emperor uses horses to hide the emperor, and abandon the country. If the officials ask the wife to pay for the horse, it must be the same." "Biography of Su Qin": "In the early days, Su Qin Zhiyan, the lender used a hundred dollars as capital, and got rich and honored with a hundred gold."

" Compensation " also means compensation and compensation. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qi Ce III": "The straight daughter of the elephant bed, if it hurts, it will be bleak, and it is not enough to sell his wife." "Han Shu. "Jia Chuan, the Father of Yan Zhu Wuqiu, King Xu Yanzhuan": "There are even two or three deaths due to illness. Although they are captured by the country, they are not enough to pay for the death."

" Compensation " also means fulfillment and satisfaction. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Han Yu's "Xinxiu Tengwang Pavilion": "It's nothing and pays back. If you get one, you can steal your eyes and get what you want." Southern Song Xin Qiji "Die Lianhua": "Overwhelming unpaid ordinary wishes, a cup Sing early to persuade Yangguan."
humanum_short_description_en: From " people " to " appreciation " sound. The original meaning is to return and repay.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「賞」聲。本義是歸還、償還。《說文》：「償，還也。从人，賞聲。」《廣雅．釋言》：「償，復也。」如《左傳．定公三年》：「君以弄馬之故，隱君身，棄國家。群臣請相夫人以償馬，必如之。」《史記．蘇秦列傳》：「初，蘇秦之燕，貸人百錢為資，及得富貴，以百金償之。」

　　「償」也表示賠償、抵償。如《戰國策．齊策三》：「象床之直千金，傷此若髮漂，賣妻子不足償之。」《漢書．嚴朱吾丘主父徐嚴終王賈傳》：「兵未血刃而病死者什二三，雖舉越國而虜之，不足以償所亡。」

　　「償」還表示實現、滿足。如唐代韓愈〈新修滕王閣記〉：「及其無事且還，倘得一至其處，竊寄目償所願焉。」南宋辛棄疾〈蝶戀花〉：「傾蓋未償平日願，一杯早唱陽關勸。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「賞」聲。本義是歸還、償還。

Pinyin: cháng
English Definition: to repay; to compensate for; to recompense; to fulfill (hopes etc)
Total strokes: 17; Radical: 人
Pictophonetic: 賞 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.

    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 賞 [ shǎng ] reward; to appreciate; to bestow, to grant
Example Words:

More: 償* | *償 | *償*

從「 人 」，「 賞 」聲。本義是歸還、償還。《說文》：「償，還也。从人，賞聲。」《廣雅．釋言》：「償，復也。」如《左傳．定公三年》：「君以弄馬之故，隱君身，棄國家。群臣請相夫人以償馬，必如之。」《史記．蘇秦列傳》：「初，蘇秦之燕，貸人百錢為資，及得富貴，以百金償之。」 「 償 」也表示賠償、抵償。如《戰國策．齊策三》：「象床之直千金，傷此若髮漂，賣妻子不足償之。」《漢書．嚴朱吾丘主父徐嚴終王賈傳》：「兵未血刃而病死者什二三，雖舉越國而虜之，不足以償所亡。」 「 償 」還表示實現、滿足。如唐代韓愈〈新修滕王閣記〉：「及其無事且還，倘得一至其處，竊寄目償所願焉。」南宋辛棄疾〈蝶戀花〉：「傾蓋未償平日願，一杯早唱陽關勸。」

If the officials ask the wife to pay for the horse, it must be the same." "Biography of Su Qin": "In the early days, Su Qin Zhiyan, the lender used a hundred dollars as capital, and got rich and honored with a hundred gold." " Compensation" also means compensation and compensation. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qi Ce III": "The straight daughter of the elephant bed, if it hurts, it will be bleak, and it is not enough to sell his wife." "Han Shu. "Jia Chuan, the Father of Yan Zhu Wuqiu, King Xu Yanzhuan": "There are even two or three deaths due to illness. Although they are captured by the country, they are not enough to pay for the death." " Compensation" also means fulfillment and satisfaction. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Han Yu's "Xinxiu Tengwang Pavilion": "It's nothing and pays back. If you get one, you can steal your eyes and get what you want." Southern Song Xin Qiji "Die Lianhua": "Overwhelming unpaid ordinary wishes, a cup Sing early to persuade Yangguan."

償字的基本解释

償
cháng
见“偿”。

償字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháng］
［《廣韻》市羊切，平陽，禪。］
［《廣韻》時亮切，去漾，禪。］
“偿1”的繁体字。
(1)赔偿；偿还。
(2)补偿；抵偿。
(3)谓抵得上。
(4)报答；酬报。
(5)应对，酬答。
(6)回报，报复。参见“償怨”、“償寃”。
(7)实现；满足。

償字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　償； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页120第12
【廣韻】市羊切【集韻】辰羊切，?音常。還所值也。【前漢·雋不疑傳】不疑爲郞，或誤持同舍郞金去，同舍郞意不疑，不疑買金償之。　又酬報。【左傳·僖十五年】西鄰責言，不可償也。　又【集韻】始兩切，音賞。又時亮切，音尚。義?同。

償字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。

Name meaning

cháng
вм. 偿
Radicals: ｲ, 賞  (leader, prize)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader presents you with a prize as reparation for his past deeds. This leader wronged you in the past and wishes to make amends. Therefore the leader presents you with a reparation in the form of a glittering prize.
Imagine receiving your reparation prize. Feel the prize in your hand. It’s all wrapped up but it’s heavy and feels expensive. What could it be?
Reading Mnemonic
The leader who presented you with this reparation is the Shougun (しょう) of Japan. He's trying to make up for all the threats he made to you and some of the things you saw (which he's now trying to cover up for).
Imagine receiving your reparations from the Shougun himself. You're angry at him for threatening you, wounding people, and cutting off the heads of people who go against him, but you take it anyway.
